content.rendered:
Careers

accelerate your career

M4 Engineering is continually looking for talented and energetic people with expertise in the following areas to add to its growing team:

  • Multidisciplinary Analysis and Optimization
  • Structural Analysis
  • Computer Science
  • Computational Fluid Dynamics
  • Aeroelasticity
  • Composites
  • Mechanical Design
  • Ground and Flight Testing

If you are interested in joining our team, please submit your resume by selecting one of the open positions listed below. If no positions are listed, you can send a general inquiry and/or resume to careers (at) m4-engineering.com. Whether we’re actively recruiting or not, we’re always eager to meet talented people who have an interest in contributing to our company.

Also note, we often tweet job openings, so please follow us on Twitter at @m4engineering.

When submitting a resume, please use these guidelines:

  • Attach only resumes that consist of Microsoft documents or PDFs.
  • Jobs are located in Long Beach, California, unless otherwise noted.
  • Please do not call about job postings.
  • We are an equal opportunity employer.
  • We offer competitive benefits.

We combine state-of-the-art software development with expertise in multidisciplinary design analysis and optimization (MDAO). Together, we are able to save time and reduce the costs associated with the analysis of high performance systems and structures typically found in aerospace, automotive, construction, theme park attractions, and energy production, including wind, oil, and coal.

Our current job openings are listed below.

IT Generalist

Description M4 is looking for an IT generalist to join our team in Long Beach, CA. You’ll wear multiple hats – in a good way – while helping to keep our unique team of aerospace professionals humming along. You’ll help us handle everything from occasional tier-one phone support to systemwide architectural restructuring. Our IT team....

Sales/Marketing Coordinator

M4 Sales/Marketing Coordinator (SAMC) is a newly created position designed to utilize and grow practical administrative experience in Sales & Marketing while working in a technical software/engineering sales environment. The SAMC will perform the following tasks: Sales: Enter and manage tasks related to our sales process/opportunities Process and Track New Software and Annual Maintenance orders....

Composite Lamination Technician

The Position: A composite lamination technician is needed to support M4’s growing manufacturing capability. This individual will have primary responsibility for supporting a wide range of aerospace programs. Responsibilities may vary from producing composite tooling, material kitting, lamination, and trimming. Employer is a rapidly growing small company with excellent advancement potential.   Requirements: US Citizen....

Aerospace Engineering Internship

M4 Engineering is a dynamic and rapidly growing high technology engineering company located in Long Beach. We are currently seeking a highly organized, enthusiastic individual to join our engineering team. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to work with a dynamic team performing engineering research and analysis for Department of Defense, NASA, and commercial....

CAE/CAD Software Sales Representative

M4 Engineering Inc. is a premier aerospace engineering firm focusing on conventional and unconventional aircraft, rotorcraft, launch vehicles, and other highly engineered systems. We are seeking a smart, energetic, and outgoing Outside Sales Representative to promote CAD/CAE Software (and Services) to companies in highly technical product development/engineering environments. Position: Full time Location: Open Compensation: Base,....

Aerospace Structural Engineer

Description: A structural analysis engineer is needed to perform structural analysis for aircraft components. This individual will have primary responsibility for structural analysis tasks throughout the design process. Tasks during preliminary design will include performing material and structural concept trade studies for various structural components. Responsibilities during detailed design will include detailed analysis and documentation....
